name: Pacbreakoban
description:
It's a little bit Pac-Man.
It's a little bit Breakout.
It's a little bit Sokoban.
It's Pacbreakoban!

8 levels of pure mashup'd puzzling!

Known issues

  • Breakout ball physics can be a bit annoying (use Up or Down to reset the ball)
  • Rare glitches can happen with Sokoban blocks (restart the level with R)

Credits

This game was made by Wan (@mkalamalami) for the 67th Ludum Dare "MiniLD" compo (entry page). I mostly made this game to discover Unity, and to warm up for the upcoming Game Dev Party, a French game jam.
